changeSet.sql: UPDATE CodeTableItem SET ISENABLED = '0' WHERE TABLENAME = 'BDMSourceCountry' AND CODE = 'ZM' AND LOCALEIDENTIFIER = 'en'; UPDATE CodeTableItem SET ISENABLED = '0' WHERE TABLENAME = 'BDMSourceCountry' AND CODE = 'ZM' AND LOCALEIDENTIFIER = 'fr';
